text: Gary Allan Knopp (1956/57 â€“ July 31, 2020) was an American Republican politician. He was a member of the Alaska House of Representatives from 2017 to 2020. He was born in Whitefish, Montana. Knopp was killed in a plane crash near Soldotna, Alaska on July 31, 2020 at the age of 64. ==References== Category:1950s births Category:2020 deaths Category:Aviation deaths in the United States Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Montana Category:Politicians from Alaska Category:People from Whitefish, Montana Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Gary Knopp
